entry.title: Re @spideycyp_155 @EvaFoxU There are ~25k terminals in Ukraine, but each terminal can be used to provide an Internet uplink to a cell phone tower, so ...
entry.summary: Re @spideycyp_155 @EvaFoxU There are ~25k terminals in Ukraine, but each terminal can be used to provide an Internet uplink to a cell phone tower, so potentially several thousand people can be served by a single terminal

entry.title: Re @NASAEarthMars That is quite an interesting story. We sent what appeared to be identical emails to all, but each was actually coded with either one...
entry.summary: Re @NASAEarthMars That is quite an interesting story. We sent what appeared to be identical emails to all, but each was actually coded with either one or two spaces between sentences, forming a binary signature that identified the leaker.
